ingredients.ingredient: 1 head cauliflower, cut into large florets
2 tablespoons butter, melted, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Pat cauliflower dry before roasting to achieve golden browning
Toss florets with melted butter for even coating and color development
Roast at high temperature to create caramelized, crispy edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What is the key to achieving golden, caramelized edges on roasted cauliflower?
